boundary_diffusion Module Reference
transport

Boundary diffusive flux interface to be fulfilled by driver or application. More...

List of all members.

Data Types

interface  boundary_diffusive_flux_if
 Calculate boundary diffusion flux. More...
interface  boundary_diffusive_matrix_if
 Generic interface for calculating BC of matrix that should be fulfilled by the driver or the client programs. More...

Public Member Functions

subroutine set_diffusion_boundary (bc_flux, bc_matrix)
subroutine no_diffusion_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Example diffusive flux that prints an error and bails.
subroutine neumann_zero_diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Diffusion boundary condition that enforces zero constituent flux.
subroutine neumann_sin_diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Example diffusive flux that imposes sinusoidal time dependent Neumann boundary flux at both ends of the channel.
subroutine no_diffusion_matrix (center_diag, up_diag, down_diag, right_hand_side, conc, explicit_diffuse_op, area, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, theta_stm, ncell, time, nvar, dx, dt)
 No-diffusion implementation for use as a pointer when diffusion is off.

Public Attributes

procedure(boundary_diffusive_flux_if),
pointer 		boundary_diffusion_flux = > null()
 This pointer should be set by the driver or client code to specify the treatment at the boundaries.
procedure(boundary_diffusive_matrix_if),
pointer 		boundary_diffusion_matrix = > null()
 This pointer should be set by the driver or client code to specify the treatment at the first and last row of coefficient matrix.

Detailed Description

Boundary diffusive flux interface to be fulfilled by driver or application.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine boundary_diffusion::neumann_sin_diffusive_flux ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,

real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,

integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Example diffusive flux that imposes sinusoidal time dependent Neumann boundary flux at both ends of the channel.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]diffusive_flux_loFace flux, lo side
[in,out]diffusive_flux_hiFace flux, hi side
[in]area_loLow side area centered at time
[in]area_hiHigh side area centered at time
[in]timeTime
[in]concConcentration
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]dtSpatial step
[in]dxTime step

subroutine boundary_diffusion::no_diffusion_matrix ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  down_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  explicit_diffuse_op,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  theta_stm,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

No-diffusion implementation for use as a pointer when diffusion is off.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of right hand side vector
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffuive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
subroutine boundary_diffusion::set_diffusion_boundary ( procedure(boundary_diffusive_flux_if), pointer  bc_flux,
procedure(boundary_diffusive_matrix_if), pointer  bc_matrix 
)
Parameters:
bc_fluxDiffusion flux routine
bc_matrixDiffusion matrix routine
